GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v4.19.218
GSD.description:
NFC: reorder the logic in nfc_{un,}register_device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.218 by commit c45cea83e13699bdfd47842e04d09dd43af4c371, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit be055b2f89b5842f41363b5655a33dffb51a8294. For more details please see the references link.
